parameters.name: location
parameters.description: This string indicates the geographic area to be used when searching for businesses.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the location to search from. If latitude is provided, longitude is required too.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the location to search from. If longitude is provided, latitude is required too.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Search term, e.g. 'food' or 'restaurants'. The term may also be the business's name, such as 'Starbucks'.
